certifications.name: FSSAI License
certifications.issuingBody: Food Safety and Standards Authority of India
certifications.scope: Manufacture, processing, packaging, storage, and sale of packaged food products including dates, nuts, and dried fruits
certifications.notes: Central license allows interstate trade and import of food products across India

certifications.name: HACCP Certification
certifications.fullName: Hazard Analysis and Critical Control Points
certifications.scope: Food safety management system for processing, packaging, and distribution of dates and nuts
certifications.notes: HACCP ensures systematic identification and control of food safety hazards

certifications.name: Vegetarian Certification
certifications.notes: All products display green dot vegetarian symbol as per FSSAI regulations

certifications.name: Import License - Brazil/Bolivia
certifications.scope: Import of Brazil Nuts from Brazil and Bolivia
certifications.notes: Includes phytosanitary certificates and customs clearance documentation

certifications.name: Import License - Middle East
certifications.scope: Import of dates from Saudi Arabia, Jordan, Palestine, UAE, Iran
certifications.notes: Includes origin certificates and halal compliance documentation

certifications.name: Import License - Nuts (Multiple Origins)
certifications.scope: Import of nuts from Turkey, Italy, China, Korea, Kenya, Australia, USA
certifications.notes: Covers hazelnuts, pine nuts, macadamia, pecan nuts

certifications.name: Cold Chain Certification
certifications.scope: Temperature-controlled storage and distribution from origin to retail
certifications.notes: Ensures freshness and quality through uninterrupted cold chain (2-8°C)

certifications.name: GST Registration
certifications.scope: Registered for GST collection and compliance across India
certifications.notes: Full tax compliance for B2B and B2C sales

standards.name: ISO 22000
standards.description: International standard for food safety management covering entire food chain
standards.notes: Working towards full ISO 22000:2018 certification by end of 2025

standards.name: GMP
standards.description: Quality assurance practices for food manufacturing and handling
standards.notes: Regular GMP audits ensure consistent product quality and safety

standards.name: Traceability System
standards.description: Digital system to trace every product from origin farm to consumer
standards.notes: Customers can scan QR code to see complete journey of their product

standards.name: Lab Testing Protocol
standards.description: Regular testing of all products for nutritional values, contaminants, and safety
standards.notes: All nutritional claims verified through NABL-accredited lab testing

standards.name: Packaging Standards
standards.description: Use of food-safe, recyclable packaging materials meeting international standards
standards.notes: All packaging tested for food safety and meets global export standards

qualityMetrics.measurementMethod: Customer feedback analysis and return rate tracking
qualityMetrics.dataSource: Internal quality tracking system + customer surveys
qualityMetrics.notes: Complaint rate based on quality issues (freshness, contamination, packaging damage) per 1000 orders

qualityMetrics.measurementMethod: Temperature sensors in all shipments + regular audits
qualityMetrics.notes: Zero temperature excursions recorded in 2024; any breach triggers automatic rejection
Even during festival peak seasons (Diwali, Eid, Christmas)
Consistently high ratings across product quality, freshness, packaging, and delivery

qualityMetrics.value: Average 18-month shelf life remaining at delivery
qualityMetrics.flyberryRate: 18+ months remaining (75% of total shelf life)
qualityMetrics.notes: Direct sourcing and rapid turnover ensures maximum freshness for customers

qualityMetrics.measurementMethod: Third-party lab testing vs. label claims
qualityMetrics.notes: Far exceeds FSSAI requirements; ensures customers get exactly what's promised

2023: Enhanced cold chain monitoring with IoT sensors

competitiveAdvantages.certification: Full FSSAI and HACCP compliance with third-party verification
competitiveAdvantages.testing: Quarterly lab testing by NABL-accredited labs
competitiveAdvantages.coldChain: 100% maintained from origin to delivery (IoT monitored)
competitiveAdvantages.freshness: 18+ months shelf life remaining at delivery

publicVerification.labReports: Available on request for B2B clients
publicVerification.traceability: Scan QR code on any package for complete product journey
